workflow.name: Doctor appointment management system with Gemini AI, WhatsApp, Stripe & Google Sheets
workflow.description:
WhatsApp AI Assistant for Clinic Appointment Booking
Automate your entire appointment lifecycle with an intelligent AI assistant that lives on WhatsApp. This workflow empowers any clinic or independent practitioner to manage bookings, take payments, and send reminders without manual intervention, using Google Sheets as a simple database.

This template handles everything from the initial booking conversation to sending the final reminder, allowing you to focus on your patients, not your schedule.

## Features
ü§ñ Conversational AI Booking: A Google Gemini-powered agent guides patients through booking, rescheduling, and canceling appointments in a natural, friendly chat.

üóìÔ∏è Smart Scheduling: The AI checks for available slots based on your working hours and existing appointments in Google Sheets, preventing double-bookings.

üîî Automated Reminders: A daily trigger automatically sends WhatsApp reminders to patients for their appointments on that day, reducing no-shows.

üí≥ Seamless Payments: Integrated with Stripe to handle online payments. The workflow sends a confirmation message upon successful payment.

üìä Centralized Management: Uses a single Google Sheet with separate tabs for Patients, Appointments, and Configuration, making it easy to view and manage all your data.

üîÑ Easy Rescheduling & Cancellations: Patients can manage their own bookings through the WhatsApp chat, and all changes are instantly reflected in your Google Sheet.

## Prerequisites
Before you begin, you will need the following accounts and credentials:

n8n Account: A running n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted).

WhatsApp Business Account: Access to the WhatsApp Cloud API.

Google Account: For using Google Sheets and the Google Gemini (AI) API.

Stripe Account: To process online payments.

n8n Credentials: You must configure credentials in your n8n instance for:

WhatsApp Cloud API

Google Sheets (OAuth2)

Google Gemini API

Stripe

## Setup Instructions
Follow these steps carefully to get your automated assistant up and running.

Step 1: Set Up Your Google Sheet
This workflow relies on a specific Google Sheet structure.

Create a new Google Sheet.

Rename the sheet to something memorable, like "Clinic Appointments".

Create three tabs at the bottom with the exact names: Patients, Appointments, and Config.

Set up the columns for each tab as follows (the header names must be an exact match):

Patients tab:
patient_id, whatsapp_number, name, age, gender

Appointments tab:
appointment_id, patient_id, whatsapp_number, date, time, payment_method, payment_status, status, stripe_payment_intent

Config tab:
key, value
(Add a row with working_hours as the key and a value like 10:00-18:00)

Step 2: Configure the Workflow Nodes
Now, you'll link the workflow to your accounts and your new Google Sheet.

Update All Google Sheets Nodes: Go through every Google Sheets node in the workflow (e.g., "Get Appointment sheet", "Add Patient", "Google Sheets Trigger") and do the following:

Select your Google Sheets credential from the dropdown.

In the Document ID field, paste the ID of your Google Sheet.

Select the correct sheet (Appointments, Patients, etc.) from the Sheet Name dropdown.

Update All WhatsApp Nodes: Go through every WhatsApp node (e.g., "Send message", "WhatsApp Trigger", "Send Payment Confirmation"):

Select your WhatsApp credential.

Enter your Phone Number ID from your Meta for Developers account.

Update AI & Stripe Nodes:

In the Google Gemini Chat Model nodes, select your Google Gemini credential.

In the Stripe Trigger node, select your Stripe credential.

Step 3: Activate the Workflow
Click Save to apply your changes.

Click the Activate toggle in the top-right corner to turn the workflow on.

Your AI appointment assistant is now live! Send a message to your WhatsApp number to begin testing.

## Customization
Change Reminder Time: To change the daily reminder time, open the Schedule Trigger node and adjust the hour from the default of 8 AM.

Edit AI Personality: To modify how the AI communicates, edit the system message in the AI Agent node (the one connected to the WhatsApp Trigger). You can change its tone, instructions, or language.

parameters.content:
## Cancel Booking Workflow.
- **Trigger:** User / Doctor cancels the appointment from Google Sheet.
- **If 1:** Detects the cancellation event in the sheet.
- **If 2:** Sends a WhatsApp message to the user informing them about the cancellation.
- **If 2:** Verifies if payment was completed via Stripe.
- **Stripe (if paid):** Initiates a refund using Stripe API & Updates the Refund Status in sheet.

#

## Appointment Reminder Workflow
- **Trigger:** Scheduled trigger fires daily at 8:00 AM.
- **AI Agent Action 1:** Retrieves today's appointments.
- **AI Agent Action 2:** Generates personalized reminder messages.
- **AI Agent Action 3:** Sends the reminder to each user via WhatsApp.

#

## Payment Verification Workflow
- **Trigger:** Stripe webhook triggers on successful payment.
- **Step 1:** Call Stripe API to retrieve payment metadata.
- **Step 2:** Update the corresponding appointment row in Google Sheet:
  - Set `status` to `Confirmed`
  - Set `payment_status` to `Paid`
  - Save `Stripe Payment Intent` for future refund reference
- **Step 3:** Send payment confirmation message to the user via WhatsApp.

options.systemMessage:
You are an AI Assistant for a Doctor Clinic.
Your role is to handle doctor‚Äôs appointment bookings via WhatsApp.
You must always keep track of the user‚Äôs progress with simple memory, and store/retrieve data in Google Sheets.
Payments are handled via Stripe or Cash on Clinic.
Always be polite, WhatsApp-friendly, and guide users step by step.

Core Workflow:

Greeting & Main Menu

When a user sends any message for the first time, greet them:
"Hello, Welcome to Doctor Clinic!
Please choose an option:

1. New Booking
2. My Upcoming Bookings
3. Reschedule Booking
4. Cancel Booking"

Wait for the user‚Äôs choice.

New Booking Flow
(a) Patient Lookup

get user registered patients

If patients exist with , show patient list and ask which one to use.

If no patient exists for given WhatsApp number or user selects "Add New Patient":

Ask for Name, Age, Gender.

Save to Patients sheet.

again fetch the latest patient list for user 

Show updated patient list with patient_id ( must be displayed to user ), name, age and gender then ask which one to use ( user can reply with number option also ). 

(b) Date Selection

Get the today's date and time from system

Generate 7 days (today + 6 days).

Exclude fully booked days.

Ask user to choose a date.

(c) Time Slot Selection

For chosen date, use working hours from Config sheet.

Divide into slots of 60 minutes.

Exclude already booked slots for chosen date Using All Appointments sheet.

Exclude not_available slot using give date and time from config sheet in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM to HH:MM means on this date on given time range doctor will not be available.

if todays date is chosen, Get the current time from system &  show only the slots after the current system time ( ex. if current time is 12:05 then give option from 13:00).

Show available slots and ask user to pick one.

(d) Payment Options

After time is selected, ask:
"How would you like to pay?

1. Online (Stripe)
2. Cash at Clinic"

(e) Confirmation Message

After taking all the data add the appointment in appointment sheet if user selects online (stripe) then save payment_method "Stripe"

and send confirm message with:
"Appointment booked!
Patient: {name}
Date: {date}
Time: {time}
Payment Method: {method}
Payment Status: Not paid
Status: Confirmed"

My Upcoming Bookings Flow

Get the current date and time from system

Look up all future user appointments.
Get all user patients.

show them as a list with user name , booking date , booking time

Reschedule Flow

Look up all future confirmed appointments for the user.
Get all user patients.

Show them as a list with appointment id, user name, appointment date & time.

Ask which one to reschedule.

Get the today's date and time from system

Generate 7 days (today + 6 days).

Exclude fully booked days.

Ask user to choose a date.

For chosen date, use working hours from Config sheet.

Divide into slots of 60 minutes.

Exclude already booked slots for chosen date Using All Appointments sheet.

Exclude not_available slot using give date and time from config sheet in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM to HH:MM means on this date on given time range doctor will not be available.

if todays date is chosen, Get the current time from system &  show only the slots after the current system time ( ex. if current time is 12:05 then give option from 13:00).

Show available slots and ask user to pick one.
after the current system time ( if current time is 12:05 then give option from 13:00).

Show available slots and ask user to pick one.

after picking one update the old appointment details with selected date and time 

and give a message to user that appointment has been reschedule and give details for new rescheduled appointment with patient details.

Cancel Flow

Get the today's date and time from system

Look up all future user appointments.

Show them as a list with appointment id, appointment date & time .

Ask which one to cancel.

then Cancel the selected appointment Appointment sheet.

Send confirmation:
"Your appointment on {date} at {time} has been cancelled."

Google Sheets Structure:
Patients: patient_id, whatsapp_number, name, age, gender
Appointments: appointment_id, patient_id, whatsapp_number, date, time, payment_method, payment_status, status, stripe_payment_intent
Config Sheet: key, value ( working_hours=10:00-18:00)

Memory Rules:

Always remember where the user left off (menu, patient selection, date, time, payment).

If the user sends something invalid, say:
"Sorry, I didn‚Äôt understand that. Please reply with one of the given options."

If the user returns later, continue from the last remembered step.

Style Guide:

single patient can register multiple patients and book as many appointments.

Keep messages short, clear, and WhatsApp-friendly.

Use numbers for options ( like reply with  1, 2, 3 ).

Always confirm before finalizing.

parameters.content:
## Payment Link Generation
- **Trigger:** New Appointment Added in Sheet
- **Step 1:** Checks if payment method is Stripe.
- **Step 2:** Creating Stripe Session Checkout Payment Link With metadata:
   - appointmentId
   - user whatsapp number 
- **Step 3:** Send payment Link to the user via WhatsApp.

## üöÄ Try It Out: AI-Powered WhatsApp Booking Assistant

Manage your **appointments** with ease ‚Äî book, reschedule, cancel, and even **collect payments online** ‚Äî all through WhatsApp!

### ‚úÖ What This Does:
Launch a smart AI assistant that handles:
- üóì **Appointment bookings**  
- üîÅ **Rescheduling**  
- ‚ùå **Cancellations**  
- üí≥ **Online payments via Stripe**

All actions are handled directly through **WhatsApp** for a smooth and intuitive user experience.

---

### üõ† How to Get Started

1. **Connect Your Credentials:**
   - WhatsApp API  
   - Google Gemini API  
   - Google Sheet  
   - Stripe Secret Key  

2. **Activate the Workflow**

3. **Message your WhatsApp bot** with any of the following to get started:
   - `"Hi"`  
   - `"Create New Booking"`  

---

### üí¨ Need Help?

Learn how to create this appointment booking workflow from scratch.
Follow this video : [YouTube](https://youtube.com)

**Happy building!**  
‚Äî [GreatStack](https://greatstack.dev)
This nodes allows your agent create and get data from Google Sheets

Appointment Booking AI Assistant:
1. Create Booking
2. View Upcoming Appointment 
3. Rescheduling
4. Cancellation

Edit the **System Message** to adjust your agent‚Äôs thinking, behavior, and replies.

‚öôÔ∏è **Setup Instructions**:

1. Edit the **Get Appointment Sheet** node ‚Üí Replace `YOUR_SPREADSHEET_ID_HERE` and `YOUR_SHEET_TAB_ID_HERE` with your Google Sheet details.
2. Edit the **Send WhatsApp Message** node ‚Üí Replace `YOUR_PHONE_NUMBER_HERE` with a test phone number.
3. In n8n Credentials Manager:
   - Add your Google Sheets credentials
   - Add your WhatsApp Business Cloud credentials
4. Activate the workflow. At 8 AM daily, reminders will be sent automatically.

nodes.name: Send message in WhatsApp Business Cloud

parameters.textBody: Hello {{ $json['Name'] }}, this is a reminder for your appointment scheduled today at {{ $json['Time'] }}.

options.systemMessage:
You are an AI assistant responsible for sending WhatsApp reminders for scheduled appointments. Follow the steps below:

1. Fetch appointments from the Google Sheet configured by the user.
2. Get current date using the Date & Time node.
3. Filter appointments where appointment date matches today and status is Pending or Confirmed.
4. Send WhatsApp Reminder including recipient name, date, and time.

Example:
Hello [Name], this is a reminder for your appointment scheduled today at [Time].

parameters.textBody: =Your Appointment {{ $('Google Sheets Trigger1').item.json.appointment_id }} is cancelled and the refund has been initiated

=Your payment has been received for Appointment ID: [{{ $json.data[0].metadata.appointmentId }}]. 

Thank you for booking your appointment with us!

=This is the link to pay for your appointment Id {{ $json.metadata.appointmentId }}

{{ $json.url }}

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
